attributes.action: Scrap GCSE, AS Level and A Levels for 2021 to ensure fairness
attributes.additional_details: Allow the classroom assessment to take place to ensure fairness to all students that have had different levels of education during COVID
attributes.background: Scrap GCSE, AS Level and A Levels for 2021 to ensure fairness

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

MPs will debate the impact of Covid-19 on schools and exams, including the request made by the above petition, on Monday 7 December at 6pm. You'll be able to watch online on the UK Parliament YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/UKParliament
